AboutPage.h1: we are a digital production team.
AboutPage.p: Gleamy is a leading design & software development agency based in berlin. We help startups & Fortune 500 companies delight humans on the other side of the screen.

identity.title: Bringing the history of your brand to the forefront gives an emotional dimension to your visual identity, which is essential today more than ever in today's digital landscape.
